headline: Oceania Cruises Announces 2026 Specialty Cruises Featuring Celebrated Culinary Figures, Exclusive Events, Hosted Shore Excursions, and Enriching Onboard Programming
summary: Oceania Cruises®, the world's leading culinary- and destination-focused cruise line, has unveiled a selection of its 2026 Specialty Cruises, offering enriching onboard programming led by renowned guest hosts and culinary experts paired with itineraries that explore captivating ports around the globe. Guests can look forward to exceptional cuisine, exclusive events, hosted shore excursions, and meaningful opportunities to connect with local cultures.
